post.body: Thank U 4 the Cmas Card! Love all the pictures 2! Merry Christmas sweety & see u soon! =D
Oh! How I love Mozart! But if you want 2 chill, try Vivaldi. =D
No craving is worth me having to go out in the cold, girl!
@karen3d I'm still in my pj's too. I'm FREEZING!
that reminds me of that Coke or Pepsi commercial when the football player threw his jersey at that little boy @ the end. lol
I think she's nice on line and off line if you ask me. =D
only you would attempt that! ROTFL Is Praise U in this Storm next? LOL j/k
Well she doesn't have a pink bbq bucket, so it wouldn't be worth it. LOL
Morning all! Devotional & Exercise done.TYJ! Now I'm off 2 accomplish some things around this house 2day! Tweet l8tr w/ details. LOL
G'nite Tweets! I'm prayin I'll have a more productive day 2morrow now matter how awful I feel, in Jesus' name! Lord bless u all 2nite!
Oh my gosh. I never did do anything. I put all the laundry away and then laid down! *yawns* HB is home now. Good.
I'm off to paint my Cmas bags 4 our neighbors cookies which I will be baking 2morrow! Pray my Cmas shapes will take! =D
http://twitpic.com/vbm0 - yeah, I was gonna say "no, I'm not wearing a Def Leppard shirt". DECEMBERADIO IS WAY BETTER!!!
http://twitpic.com/vbm0 - Here's my hair from the other day. Can you see my gray hair? I ♥ my grays!!! hehehe
I haven't done anything productive! Oh no! I made 3 banners 4 my @etsy & just sold 2! HB was here earlier talkin bout cell phones. *sigh*
I was secretly hoping HB would remember 1 of the last things he said last night about taking me 2 a ATT store 2day. I doubt it tho. *sigh*
Morning Twitters! My day will consist of painting Cmas bags and laundry. We'll see if we get around 2 making 4doz cookies. Lord willing! =D
G'night Tweets! Gettin up early 2morrow 2 spend time in the Word, w/ Jesus & exercise in Jesus' name! Amen & Amen! Maybe some @etsy work. â˜º
When 3D is town, I can change kitchen colors: http://tinyurl.com/8bpspv *lqtm*
yall know what 2morrow is? 1 month anniversary til we leave! I'm so nervous! Never been on a boat or plane so I'm gettin a double whammy! =O
